metadata.name: The Rat Pack
metadata.description:
Adds: 2 new enemies 4 new items 60+ rooms +more to come!
-Coop friendly -Supports External item descriptions
[h1]Enemies[/h1] [list] [*][b]The Rat[/b]: weak but clever creatures that will tunnel through obstacles to catch Isaac by surprise [*] [b]Healer Fly[/b]: Passive enemy that will use poops in the room to heal injured monsters [/list]
[h1]Items[/h1] [list] [*][b]Haircut[/b]: +.5 tears up and Isaac's new haircut will fear any enemies that touch it
[*] [b]Book of Mischief[/b]: 4 charge active item that spawns a swarm of friendly rats to fight assist Isaac for the duration of the room
[*] [b]Strange Snacks[/b]: +1 black heart and monsters spawned by other monsters (ie Portal, baby long legs, etc...) will be poisoned
[*] [b]Burrow Buster Bombs[/b]: Isaac's bombs that blow up rocks will cause a domino effect of explosions in the connected rocks
[*] [b]Pack Rat[/b]: Isaac gains a trash friend for every 7 coins, keys, or bombs he has (Up to 30 friends). If Isaac has the Box item, it only costs 4 coins, keys, or bombs -Garbage Friend: Blocks projectiles and releases slowing creep -Box Friend: Shoots projectiles in random directions -Spiky Friend: Attacks any monsters that walk near
[/list]
